item.description: Structure Fire; INC#1270; 07:06PM; 456 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3anXS10; Downtown; 48 firefighters extinguished a fire being held in check by fire sprinklers in one unit (on 6th floor) of a seven story (six residential over one commercial) garden style apartment building. One patient, 61yo M was evaluated by firefighter/paramedics and declined LAFD transport. Cause and $ loss TBD. Original 9-1-1 call was received at 6:34PM.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC10 BC13 E10 E12 E203 E210 E235 E3 E9 E94 RA11 RA814 SQ21 T10 T3 T35; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1146; 05:55PM; 3517 E 16th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DRcLEE; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 89 firefighters extinguished the fire in 39 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was centered in an auto repair shop and extended into an adjacent commercial building as well as outside into the alley, damaging at least two vehicles. A reduced number of resources will remain on scene conducting overhaul operations. There are live, energized down in multiple spots around the structures, please avoid the area. DWP is responding. Cause and $ loss TBD. ; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E11 E14 E15 E16 E17 E201 E202 E203 E209 E211 E215 E25 E27 E3 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T1 T11 T15 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1146; 05:50PM; 3517 E 16th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DRcLEE; Boyle Heights; The main fire building is an auto repair shop and the fire extended into an adjacent commercial building (to the east). There is also an outside fire in the alley to the rear of the buildings. Crews are making good progress on both structures (bulk of the fire extinguished in the secondary building). No injuries reported. The incident is at the Greater Alarm status with 89 firefighters assigned. No further details.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E11 E14 E15 E16 E17 E201 E202 E203 E209 E211 E215 E25 E3 EA1 EM11 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T1 T11 T15 T2 T3 T9 UR3 ; CH9; 13 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1146; 05:16PM; 3517 E 16th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xnqj8R; Boyle Heights; 50' x 100' commercial building with fire through the roof at the back of the structure. One more building is exposed and at least two vehicles in the alley behind the fire unit. Additional resources are requested (not reflected in this alert). ; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E14 E17 E202 E209 E25 RA17 RA25 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle - Fatality; INC#0299; 06:06AM; Wb 10 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FyBY7t; Jefferson Park; Firefighters located a single car traffic accident with one patient entrapped. An immediate extraction operation ensued and firefighter/paramedics accessed the patient (age/gender unknown at this time) to conduct an assessment. Unfortunately, the patient was beyond medical help and determined dead on scene. CHP and LA County Coroner will handle the investigation regarding identify and cause of death. All questions are referred to CHP Log# 813. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E226 E26 E34 E68 EM11 HR3 RA26 RA29 T26; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0696; 12:21PM; 710 W 82nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/30L4tQk; Vermont Knolls; KNOCKDOWN: 51 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM22 E209 E233 E264 E266 E3 E57 E64 EM11 EM13 RA257 RA264 RA57 RA64 T33 T64 T66 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0696; 12:05PM; 710 W 82nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/30L4tQk; Vermont Knolls; A two story, garden style apartment building with an active attic fire and initial reports of one unit well involved. There are no reported injuries at this time. One additional task force requested.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E266 E57 E64 EM11 EM13 RA257 RA264 RA57 RA64 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Assisting Agency; INC#0672; 11:50AM; Nb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DEu7EL; Sylmar; LAFD resources are on scene as an Assisting Agency to LA County Fire with an approximately 2 acre slow moving brush fire. This incident is entirely within LA County Fire jurisdiction and all further updates are via LACoFD. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E18 E287 E298 E7 E70 E75 E87 E90 E91 EM15 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA91 T87 T98; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0584; 11:06AM; 2699 N Westridge Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HHOrHZ; Brentwood; One 45yo male mountain biker sustained a fall and has serious injuries. Due to location and patient condition, LAFD Air Ops is preparing for a hoist rescue and air ambulance transport. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 10:50AM. No further details. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 BP19 E109 E19 E269 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 RA19 RH214 T69; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0207; 04:18AM; 520 E 9th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HEdono; Downtown; Firefighters found a two-story commercial structure with smoke showing and sprinkler activation. While sprinklers were holding much of the fire in check, flames had made their way up to the mezzanine, where textiles were stored. It took 92 firefighters 61 minutes (5:19 AM) to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E14 E17 E201 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA209 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange
